00036  * String manipulation functions.

00038  * libcfs/libcfs/util/string.c
00039  *
00040  * Author: Nathan Rutman <nathan.rutman@sun.com>

00042 #include <ctype.h>
00043 #include <errno.h>
00044 #include <stdbool.h>
00045 #include <stdio.h>
00046 #include <stdlib.h>
00047 #include <string.h>
00048 #include <libcfs/util/string.h>
00049 
00050 /*
00051  * According manual of strlcpy() and strlcat() the functions should return
00052  * the total length of the string they tried to create. For strlcpy() that
00053  * means the length of src. For strlcat() that means the initial length of
00054  * dst plus the length of src. So, the function strnlen() cannot be used
00055  * otherwise the return value will be wrong.
00056  */
00057 #ifndef HAVE_STRLCPY /* not in glibc for RHEL 5.x, remove when obsolete */
00058 size_t strlcpy(char *dst, const char *src, size_t size)
00059 {
00060         size_t ret = strlen(src);
00061 
00062         if (size) {
00063                 size_t len = (ret >= size) ? size - 1 : ret;
00064                 memcpy(dst, src, len);
00065                 dst[len] = '\0';
00066         }
00067         return ret;
00068 }
00069 #endif
00070 
00071 #ifndef HAVE_STRLCAT /* not in glibc for RHEL 5.x, remove when obsolete */
00072 size_t strlcat(char *dst, const char *src, size_t size)
00073 {
00074         size_t dsize = strlen(dst);
00075         size_t len = strlen(src);
00076         size_t ret = dsize + len;
00077 
00078         dst  += dsize;
00079         size -= dsize;
00080         if (len >= size)
00081                 len = size-1;
00082         memcpy(dst, src, len);
00083         dst[len] = '\0';
00084         return ret;
00085 }
00086 #endif
00087 
00098 int
00099 cfs_gettok(struct cfs_lstr *next, char delim, struct cfs_lstr *res)
00100 {
00101         char *end;
00102 
00103         if (next->ls_str == NULL)
00104                 return 0;
00105 
00106         /* skip leading white spaces */
00107         while (next->ls_len) {
00108                 if (!isspace(*next->ls_str))
00109                         break;
00110                 next->ls_str++;
00111                 next->ls_len--;
00112         }
00113 
00114         if (next->ls_len == 0) /* whitespaces only */
00115                 return 0;
00116 
00117         if (*next->ls_str == delim) {
00118                 /* first non-writespace is the delimiter */
00119                 return 0;
00120         }
00121 
00122         res->ls_str = next->ls_str;
00123         end = memchr(next->ls_str, delim, next->ls_len);
00124         if (end == NULL) {
00125                 /* there is no the delimeter in the string */
00126                 end = next->ls_str + next->ls_len;
00127                 next->ls_str = NULL;
00128         } else {
00129                 next->ls_str = end + 1;
00130                 next->ls_len -= (end - res->ls_str + 1);
00131         }
00132 
00133         /* skip ending whitespaces */
00134         while (--end != res->ls_str) {
00135                 if (!isspace(*end))
00136                         break;
00137         }
00138 
00139         res->ls_len = end - res->ls_str + 1;
00140         return 1;
00141 }
00142 
00152 int
00153 cfs_str2num_check(char *str, int nob, unsigned *num,
00154                   unsigned min, unsigned max)
00155 {
00156         char    *endp;
00157 
00158         *num = strtoul(str, &endp, 0);
00159         if (endp == str)
00160                 return 0;
00161 
00162         for (; endp < str + nob; endp++) {
00163                 if (!isspace(*endp))
00164                         return 0;
00165         }
00166 
00167         return (*num >= min && *num <= max);
00168 }
00169 
00183 static int
00184 cfs_range_expr_parse(struct cfs_lstr *src, unsigned min, unsigned max,
00185                      int bracketed, struct cfs_range_expr **expr)
00186 {
00187         struct cfs_range_expr   *re;
00188         struct cfs_lstr         tok;
00189 
00190         re = calloc(1, sizeof(*re));
00191         if (re == NULL)
00192                 return -ENOMEM;
00193 
00194         if (src->ls_len == 1 && src->ls_str[0] == '*') {
00195                 re->re_lo = min;
00196                 re->re_hi = max;
00197                 re->re_stride = 1;
00198                 goto out;
00199         }
00200 
00201         if (cfs_str2num_check(src->ls_str, src->ls_len,
00202                               &re->re_lo, min, max)) {
00203                 /* <number> is parsed */
00204                 re->re_hi = re->re_lo;
00205                 re->re_stride = 1;
00206                 goto out;
00207         }
00208 
00209         if (!bracketed || !cfs_gettok(src, '-', &tok))
00210                 goto failed;
00211 
00212         if (!cfs_str2num_check(tok.ls_str, tok.ls_len,
00213                                &re->re_lo, min, max))
00214                 goto failed;
00215 
00216         /* <number> - */
00217         if (cfs_str2num_check(src->ls_str, src->ls_len,
00218                               &re->re_hi, min, max)) {
00219                 /* <number> - <number> is parsed */
00220                 re->re_stride = 1;
00221                 goto out;
00222         }
00223 
00224         /* go to check <number> '-' <number> '/' <number> */
00225         if (cfs_gettok(src, '/', &tok)) {
00226                 if (!cfs_str2num_check(tok.ls_str, tok.ls_len,
00227                                        &re->re_hi, min, max))
00228                         goto failed;
00229 
00230                 /* <number> - <number> / ... */
00231                 if (cfs_str2num_check(src->ls_str, src->ls_len,
00232                                       &re->re_stride, min, max)) {
00233                         /* <number> - <number> / <number> is parsed */
00234                         goto out;
00235                 }
00236         }
00237 
00238  out:
00239         *expr = re;
00240         return 0;
00241 
00242  failed:
00243         free(re);
00244         return -EINVAL;
00245 }
00246 
00254 static int
00255 cfs_range_expr_print(char *buffer, int count, struct cfs_range_expr *expr,
00256                      bool bracketed)
00257 {
00258         int i;
00259         char s[] = "[";
00260         char e[] = "]";
00261 
00262         if (bracketed)
00263                 s[0] = e[0] = '\0';
00264 
00265         if (expr->re_lo == expr->re_hi)
00266                 i = snprintf(buffer, count, "%u", expr->re_lo);
00267         else if (expr->re_stride == 1)
00268                 i = snprintf(buffer, count, "%s%u-%u%s",
00269                                   s, expr->re_lo, expr->re_hi, e);
00270         else
00271                 i = snprintf(buffer, count, "%s%u-%u/%u%s",
00272                                   s, expr->re_lo, expr->re_hi,
00273                                   expr->re_stride, e);
00274         return i;
00275 }
00276 
00284 int
00285 cfs_expr_list_print(char *buffer, int count, struct cfs_expr_list *expr_list)
00286 {
00287         struct cfs_range_expr *expr;
00288         int i = 0, j = 0;
00289         int numexprs = 0;
00290 
00291         if (count <= 0)
00292                 return 0;
00293 
00294         list_for_each_entry(expr, &expr_list->el_exprs, re_link)
00295                 numexprs++;
00296 
00297         if (numexprs > 1)
00298                 i += snprintf(buffer + i, count - i, "[");
00299 
00300         list_for_each_entry(expr, &expr_list->el_exprs, re_link) {
00301                 if (j++ != 0)
00302                         i += snprintf(buffer + i, count - i, ",");
00303                 i += cfs_range_expr_print(buffer + i, count - i, expr,
00304                                           numexprs > 1);
00305         }
00306 
00307         if (numexprs > 1)
00308                 i += snprintf(buffer + i, count - i, "]");
00309 
00310         return i;
00311 }
00312 
00319 int
00320 cfs_expr_list_match(__u32 value, struct cfs_expr_list *expr_list)
00321 {
00322         struct cfs_range_expr   *expr;
00323 
00324         list_for_each_entry(expr, &expr_list->el_exprs, re_link) {
00325                 if (value >= expr->re_lo && value <= expr->re_hi &&
00326                     ((value - expr->re_lo) % expr->re_stride) == 0)
00327                         return 1;
00328         }
00329 
00330         return 0;
00331 }
00332 
00338 static void
00339 cfs_expr_list_free(struct cfs_expr_list *expr_list)
00340 {
00341         while (!list_empty(&expr_list->el_exprs)) {
00342                 struct cfs_range_expr *expr;
00343 
00344                 expr = list_entry(expr_list->el_exprs.next,
00345                                   struct cfs_range_expr, re_link);
00346                 list_del(&expr->re_link);
00347                 free(expr);
00348         }
00349 
00350         free(expr_list);
00351 }
00352 
00359 int
00360 cfs_expr_list_parse(char *str, int len, unsigned min, unsigned max,
00361                     struct cfs_expr_list **elpp)
00362 {
00363         struct cfs_expr_list    *expr_list;
00364         struct cfs_range_expr   *expr;
00365         struct cfs_lstr         src;
00366         int                     rc;
00367 
00368         expr_list = calloc(1, sizeof(*expr_list));
00369         if (expr_list == NULL)
00370                 return -ENOMEM;
00371 
00372         src.ls_str = str;
00373         src.ls_len = len;
00374 
00375         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&expr_list->el_exprs);
00376 
00377         if (src.ls_str[0] == '[' &&
00378             src.ls_str[src.ls_len - 1] == ']') {
00379                 src.ls_str++;
00380                 src.ls_len -= 2;
00381 
00382                 rc = -EINVAL;
00383                 while (src.ls_str != NULL) {
00384                         struct cfs_lstr tok;
00385 
00386                         if (!cfs_gettok(&src, ',', &tok)) {
00387                                 rc = -EINVAL;
00388                                 break;
00389                         }
00390 
00391                         rc = cfs_range_expr_parse(&tok, min, max, 1, &expr);
00392                         if (rc != 0)
00393                                 break;
00394 
00395                         list_add_tail(&expr->re_link,
00396                                           &expr_list->el_exprs);
00397                 }
00398         } else {
00399                 rc = cfs_range_expr_parse(&src, min, max, 0, &expr);
00400                 if (rc == 0) {
00401                         list_add_tail(&expr->re_link,
00402                                           &expr_list->el_exprs);
00403                 }
00404         }
00405 
00406         if (rc != 0)
00407                 cfs_expr_list_free(expr_list);
00408         else
00409                 *elpp = expr_list;
00410 
00411         return rc;
00412 }
00413 
00422 void
00423 cfs_expr_list_free_list(struct list_head *list)
00424 {
00425         struct cfs_expr_list *el;
00426 
00427         while (!list_empty(list)) {
00428                 el = list_entry(list->next,
00429                                     struct cfs_expr_list, el_link);
00430                 list_del(&el->el_link);
00431                 cfs_expr_list_free(el);
00432         }
00433 }
